interpretation:
The "wind face" card represents the energy of movement, change, and transition. This card is all about the power of the unseen forces that can sweep us up and take us in unexpected directions. It reminds us to be open to new experiences, even if they are uncomfortable or unfamiliar. The wind face is a symbol of the unpredictable nature of life, and the importance of staying flexible and adaptable in the face of challenges.

In a reading, this card may suggest that you are about to experience a major shift or change in your life. You may be feeling restless or uncertain about the future, but this card encourages you to embrace the unknown and trust that everything will work out in the end. Alternatively, this card may indicate that you need to be more open to new experiences and perspectives, and that it is time to let go of old habits and patterns that are no longer serving you.
